CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: A new alternating copolymer ( PSFDTBT ) based on spirobifluorene , thiophene , and benzothiadiazole units has been synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the "Material Name" entities are:

1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the new alternating copolymer being referred to in the paragraph.
2. spirobifluorene: This is one of the monomer units in the copolymer, specifically the "spiro" part of the name refers to the molecular structure of the unit.
3. thiophene: This is another monomer unit in the copolymer, specifically the "thiophene" part of the name refers to the molecular structure of the unit.
4. benzothiadiazole: This is another monomer unit in the copolymer, specifically the "benzothiadiazole" part of the name refers to the molecular structure of the unit.

So, the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph are: PSFDTBT, spirobifluorene, thiophene, and benzothiadiazole.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Of course! Here are the relevant "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

1. PSFDTBT: This is the name of the new alternating copolymer being referred to in the paragraph.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph as a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
